Ruby on Rails / Java Developers - Arlington, VA, Full-Time, Onsite

Join us to work on small Agile teams and use your passion to build large scale enterprise applications for commercial and government clients in the DC metro area. We are currently looking for enterprise Java developers and Ruby on Rails developers to design and build a public facing government website. The team typically codes in Java, Ruby, C#, Python, or JavaScript. Polyglot developers are highly valued. U.S. Citizenship is required.

Please email RPKaplan3@gmail.com for additional details.
